CMake

CMake is a tool to manage the software build process. The LBANN build system, as well as the build system of many of its dependencies, is implemented with CMake. LBANN requires CMake version 2.8.11 or later.

Installation on Linux

Talk to your sysadmin.

Installation on OS X

Use Homebrew: 

 {.sh}
$ brew install cmake
Generated on 21 Sep 2016 for LBANN by  1.6.1
